allow: Bash(cmd.exe /c "where /r C:\\SiliconLabs commander.exe 2>nul || where /r ""C:\\Program Files"" commander.exe 2>nul || echo Commander not found")
Bash(cmd.exe /c "where /r C:\\Users\\vishn\\.silabs commander.exe 2>nul || echo Not in silabs folder")
Bash(cmd.exe /c "where JLink.exe 2>nul || where JLinkExe.exe 2>nul || echo JLink not in PATH")

Bash(# Kill any existing processes pkill -f JLink sleep 1 rm -f /tmp/rtt_test.txt # Start RTT logger first \(it will connect directly\) ""C:\\Program Files\\SEGGER\\JLink_V858\\JLinkRTTLogger.exe"" -Device BGM220PC22HNA -If SWD -Speed 4000 -USB 440334920 -RTTChannel 0 /tmp/rtt_test.txt 2>&1 & RTT_PID=$! sleep 3 # Reset the device while RTT logger is connected echo ""r g "" | ""C:\\Program Files\\SEGGER\\JLink_V858\\JLink.exe"" -device BGM220PC22HNA -if SWD -speed 4000 -SelectEmuBySN 440334920 -autoconnect 1 2>&1)

Bash(# Start JLink GDB Server in background \(keeps connection alive\) ""/c/Program Files/SEGGER/JLink_V858/JLinkGDBServerCL.exe"" -device BGM220PC22HNA -if SWD -speed 4000 -noir -nolocalhostonly -port 2331 -singlerun & GDB_PID=$! sleep 3 # Reset device /c/SiliconLabs/SimplicityStudio/v5/developer/adapter_packs/commander/commander.exe device reset --device BGM220PC22HNA sleep 1 # Connect RTT Client and capture output rm -f /c/Users/vishn/AppData/Local/Temp/rtt_output.txt timeout 12 ""/c/Program Files/SEGGER/JLink_V858/JLinkRTTClient.exe"" 2>&1 & sleep 10 # Kill processes taskkill //F //IM JLinkGDBServerCL.exe taskkill //F //IM JLinkRTTClient.exe echo ""=== RTT OUTPUT ==="" cat /c/Users/vishn/AppData/Local/Temp/rtt_output.txt)

Bash(# Kill all JLink processes first taskkill //F //IM JLink.exe taskkill //F //IM JLinkGDBServerCL.exe taskkill //F //IM JLinkRTTClient.exe sleep 2 rm -f /c/Users/vishn/AppData/Local/Temp/rtt_output.txt # Start GDB Server \(keeps target running and allows RTT\) ""/c/Program Files/SEGGER/JLink_V858/JLinkGDBServerCL.exe"" -device BGM220PC22HNA -if SWD -speed 4000 -port 3333 -RTTTelnetPort 19021 -noreset & sleep 3 # Connect RTT Client and capture \(longer timeout\) timeout 25 ""/c/Program Files/SEGGER/JLink_V858/JLinkRTTClient.exe"" 2>&1 & sleep 3 # Use JLink to reset the target \(keeps connection\) echo -e ""r\\ng\\nexit"")

Bash(# Kill any existing processes taskkill //F //IM JLink.exe taskkill //F //IM JLinkGDBServerCL.exe taskkill //F //IM JLinkRTTClient.exe sleep 2 rm -f /c/Users/vishn/AppData/Local/Temp/rtt_output.txt # Start GDB Server first ""/c/Program Files/SEGGER/JLink_V858/JLinkGDBServerCL.exe"" -device BGM220PC22HNA -if SWD -speed 4000 -port 3333 -RTTTelnetPort 19021 & sleep 3 # Connect RTT Client and capture for longer timeout 35 ""/c/Program Files/SEGGER/JLink_V858/JLinkRTTClient.exe"" 2>&1 & sleep 30 taskkill //F //IM JLinkGDBServerCL.exe taskkill //F //IM JLinkRTTClient.exe echo ""=== FULL RTT TEST OUTPUT ==="" cat /c/Users/vishn/AppData/Local/Temp/rtt_output.txt)

Bash(# Kill any existing processes taskkill //F //IM JLink.exe taskkill //F //IM JLinkGDBServerCL.exe taskkill //F //IM JLinkRTTClient.exe sleep 1 # Reset device first to start fresh /c/SiliconLabs/SimplicityStudio/v5/developer/adapter_packs/commander/commander.exe device reset --device BGM220PC22HNA sleep 1 rm -f /c/Users/vishn/AppData/Local/Temp/rtt_output.txt # Start GDB Server with -noreset so it doesn''t halt the target ""/c/Program Files/SEGGER/JLink_V858/JLinkGDBServerCL.exe"" -device BGM220PC22HNA -if SWD -speed 4000 -port 3333 -RTTTelnetPort 19021 -noreset -nohalt & sleep 2 # Connect RTT Client timeout 30 ""/c/Program Files/SEGGER/JLink_V858/JLinkRTTClient.exe"" 2>&1 & sleep 25 taskkill //F //IM JLinkGDBServerCL.exe taskkill //F //IM JLinkRTTClient.exe echo ""=== FULL RTT TEST OUTPUT ==="" cat /c/Users/vishn/AppData/Local/Temp/rtt_output.txt)

Bash(# Kill any existing processes taskkill //F //IM JLink.exe taskkill //F //IM JLinkGDBServerCL.exe taskkill //F //IM JLinkRTTClient.exe sleep 1 rm -f /c/Users/vishn/AppData/Local/Temp/rtt_output.txt # Start GDB Server \(will halt target\) ""/c/Program Files/SEGGER/JLink_V858/JLinkGDBServerCL.exe"" -device BGM220PC22HNA -if SWD -speed 4000 -port 3333 -RTTTelnetPort 19021 & sleep 3 # Connect RTT Client first timeout 40 ""/c/Program Files/SEGGER/JLink_V858/JLinkRTTClient.exe"" 2>&1 & sleep 2 # Now use JLink to reset and run the target echo -e ""r\\ng\\nq"")
Bash(# Read what we captured so far from the first successful run cat /c/Users/vishn/AppData/Local/Temp/rtt_output.txt)

Bash(# Kill processes and try fresh taskkill //F //IM JLink.exe taskkill //F //IM JLinkGDBServerCL.exe taskkill //F //IM JLinkRTTClient.exe sleep 2 # Start fresh with GDB Server for stable RTT ""/c/Program Files/SEGGER/JLink_V858/JLinkGDBServerCL.exe"" -device BGM220PC22HNA -if SWD -speed 4000 -port 3333 -RTTTelnetPort 19021 -nohalt -noreset & sleep 3 # Reset device via commander \(briefly\) /c/SiliconLabs/SimplicityStudio/v5/developer/adapter_packs/commander/commander.exe device reset --device BGM220PC22HNA & sleep 1 # Use netcat/powershell to capture RTT via telnet rm -f /c/Users/vishn/AppData/Local/Temp/rtt_telnet.txt timeout 35 powershell -Command ""\(New-Object Net.Sockets.TcpClient\(''localhost'', 19021\)\).GetStream\(\) | % { \\$reader = New-Object IO.StreamReader\(\\$_\); while\(\\$true\){ \\$line = \\$reader.ReadLine\(\); if\(\\$line\){ Add-Content -Path ''C:\\Users\\vishn\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\rtt_telnet.txt'' -Value \\$line }}}"" & sleep 30 taskkill //F //IM JLinkGDBServerCL.exe taskkill //F //IM powershell.exe echo ""=== RTT TELNET OUTPUT ==="" cat /c/Users/vishn/AppData/Local/Temp/rtt_telnet.txt)

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Set-Location ''C:\\Users\\vishn\\SimplicityStudio\\v5_workspace\\flash_erase_project\\GNU ARM v12.2.1 - Default''; $env:PATH = ''C:\\SiliconLabs\\SimplicityStudio\\v5\\developer\\toolchains\\gnu_arm\\12.2.rel1_2023.7\\bin;'' + $env:PATH; make all -j4")
